Name: Warfield
About the game: Warfield Single Player Sandbox War Game Play Bots(AI) by creating your own level, Create levels as you like. Skin and Shop System! Buy weapon skins with coins! New skins in New Seasons! We design stylish skins for you. Case System! Open cases with coins! Yourself, Do you feel lucky? Would you like to try? You can spend the Points you earn by fighting to open a case! Game Modes Level Editor Sandbox (Only Single Player) Create levels as you like. it depends on your creativity! CTF (Capture The Flag, Only Multiplayer) Capture flag zones and score points! If you have more points than the enemy team, you win! Playing tactically is important JET FIGHTS (Only Multiplayer) Crush the enemy with fighter plane! 2 Teams fight their jets.
Meta Title: Warfield: Aug 6, 2022, Field Game Studio and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Warfield? Check out the release date (Aug 6, 2022), developer insights from Field Game Studio, and a complete game summary.
